verses.content: Kan sal intâng kum sâwmhni panga kum, chu kum kum ṭantir, chu thla ni sâwm ni, khawpui chu suksieta a um hnung kum sâwm pali kum, chu ni le le chun LALPA kut chu ka chungah a um a, chung- tienga chun a mi ṭhuoi tah a.
Pathien thil hmulâwknaa chun Israel ramah a mi ṭhuoi a, tlâng insângtak, a simtienga chun khawpui riruong chu a um a, chutaka chun a mîn ṭhum tah a.
Chun, chu tieng chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat, a hmêl- put dân chu dârsen ang, a kuta ziza hruol le, inkhina luonghmawl chawi a um a; dâi kawtkhâra chun ama chu a ngîr a.

Chu mi chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, i mithai khan en la, i nahai khan lo ngai bawk la, ka în hmutir dinghai che po po chunga chun i lungril sie rawh; i kuoma kân hmutir theina ding chea hi tienga hung ṭhuoi i ni hrim a; chuongchun, i hmuhai po po chu Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun puong rawh,” a tih a.

Chun, ngai ta, in puotienga chun bang chu a vêlin a um a; chu mipa kuta inkhina luonghmawl chu tawng ruka sei a na, tawng khat le kut- phabawk seng a nih; chun, a in sa tieng chu ân khi a, luonghmawl khat a na; ân sâng tieng khawm chu luong- hmawl khat bawk.

Chun, saktieng ngha dâi kawt- khâra chun a hung a, chutaka kai- lâwnhaia chun a hang feh a; dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu ân khih a, luonghmawl khat a na, tuolpûk dang khawm chu luonghmawl khat bawk a nih.

Chun, vêngna pindan tinhai chu luonghmawl khata sei, luonghmawl khata lien a nih; vêngna pindan inkâr chu tawng nga a na; dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu, a in tieng panga tuol- pûka chun luonghmawl khat a nih.
In tieng panga a dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk khawm chu ân khih a, tawng riet a nih.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu ân khi a, tawng riet a nih, chun, kawtkhâr bieng chu tawng hni; chun, a dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu in tieng panga chun a um a.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr vêngna pindanhai chu, saktieng hi tieng panga chun pathum a na; pathum chu intie seng an na; chun, a kawtkhâr bienghai khawm chu hi tieng le saw tienga chu intie an nih.
Chun, a kawtkhâr kawt lien khangtieng chu ân khi a, tawng sâwm a na; a kawtkhâr seizie chu tawng sâwmpathum;
chun, vêngna pindan hmaa a rei sîr chu hi tieng sîrah tawng khat, khing tieng sîra chun tawng khat bawk; chun, vêngna pindanhai chu hi tieng sîra chun tawng ruk, khing tieng sîra chun tawng ruk bawk.
Chun, vêngna pindan chunga pakhata inthawkin pindan dang chunga dâi kawtkhâr chu ân khi a; a khang chu tawng sâwmhni panga a na, kawtkhâra inthawka kawtkhâr dang chenin.
Chun, tuolpûk chu ân khi a, tawng sawmhni a na; huon sûng tuollai dâi kawtkhâr chen chu a tuol zâwl chu a nih.
Chun, lûtna dâi kawtkhâr tuolthlâka inthawka dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk sûngril lem tuolthlâk chen chu tawng sâwmnga a nih.

Dâi kawtkhâr chun a vêlin, pin- dan kêm kawtkhâr bieng tienga chîn inzui pei tukverhai a nei a. Chuong ang bawkin a tuolpûk sûngtieng a vêlin tukverhai an um bawk a, a banhaia chun intûm thing lim a um a.
Chun, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, ngai ta, pindanhai le lungpha, a vêla huon sûng tuollai dinga an siem chu a um a; lungpha chunga chun pindan sâwmthum a um a.
Lungpha chu dâi kawtkhârhai sîra chun a um a, dâi kawtkhârhai le inchen chie, lungpha hnuoihnung lem chu a nih.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr hnuoi- hnung lema tuolthlâka inthawka, a huon sûng tuollai sûngril lem tuol- thlâk khangtieng chu ân khi a, a saktieng a le a hmârtieng chun tawng za khat ve ve a nih.
Chun, a huon sûng tuollai puo lem dâi kawtkhâr, hmârtienga ngha chu, a chu dungtieng le chu khang- tieng chu ân khi a.

Chun, vêngna pindanhai chu hi tieng sîrah pathum, khingtieng sîrah pathum bawk a nih; chun, a kawt- khâr bienghai le a tuolpûkhai chu a dâi kawtkhâr pakhatna tie seng chu a na; a dung tieng chu tawng sâwmnga a na, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwm- hni panga.
A tukverhai le, a tuolpûk le, chutaka intûm thinghai chu, sak- tieng panga ngha dâi kawtkhâra mi tie seng kha an nih; chun, sirbi pa- sariin a hang tlung a, chun, tuolpûk chu sûngtienga chun a um a.

Chun, dâi kawtkhâr dang zâwn- a chun, tuollai sûng sûngril lema dinga dâi kawtkhârhai a um a; sak- tieng panga le hmârtieng panga chun dâi kawtkhâra inthawka dâi kawt- khâr chen chun tawng za khatin ân khi a.
Chun, sim tieng panga chun a mi ṭhuoi a, simtienga dâi kawtkhâr chu ka hmuh a, chuongchun, hi inkhina dân ang pei hin chutaka a kawtkhâr bienghai le a tuolpûkhai chu ân khi a.
Khâng tukverhai ang bawk kha, a keikul haia le chun chu- taka chun tukverhai a um a, a seizie chu tawng sâwmnga a na, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmhni panga a nih.

Chun, a hang kaina dinga chun sirbi pasari a um a; a tuolpûkhai chu chuonghai hmaa chun a um a; chun, chutaka a kawtkhâr bienghai chunga chun intûm thinghai, hi tiengah pakhat, khing tiengah pakhat bawk a um a.
Chun, simtieng panga chun a huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema dâi kawtkhâr chu a um a; chun, sim- tienga a dâi kawtkhâra inthawka dâi kawtkhâr chu tawng za khatin ân khi a.
Chun, simtienga dâi kawtkhâra chun huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a; hieng inkhina dân hin simtienga dâi kawtkhâr chu ân khih a;

hieng inkhina dân ang hin a vêngna pindanhai, kawtkhâr bieng- hai le tuolpûkhai chu ân khih a; chun, a vêlin a tuolpûkhai le chun tukver- hai a um a; tawng sâwmngaa sei, tawng sâwmhni pangaa lien a nih.
Chun, a vêlin tuolpûkhai tawng sâwmhni pangaa sei, tawng ngaa lien a um a.
Chun, a tuolpûkhai chun huon sûng tuollai puo lem tieng a nghaa, a kawtkhâr bienghai chunga chun in- tûm thinghai an um a; a hang kainaa chun kailâwn pariet a um a.
Chun, saktieng panga huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, hieng inkhina ang pei hin dâi kawtkhâr chu ân khi a,

a vêngna pindanhai, a kawt- khâr bienghai, a tuolpûkhai chu hieng inkhina dân ang hin ân khi a; chun, a tuolpûkhaia leh a vêlin tuk- verhai an um a, tawng sâwmngaa sei, tawng sâwmhni pangaa lien a nih.
A tuolpûkhai chun huon sûng tuollai puo lem tieng a ngha a, a kawtkhâr bienghaia chun, hi tieng le khing tienga khawm intûm thinghai an um a, chun a hang kaina chu sirbi pariet a nih.
Chun, hmâr tieng dâi kawt- khâra chun a mi ṭhuoi a; ama chun hieng inkhina dân ang hin ân khi a;
a vêngna pindanhai, a kawt- khâr bienghai, a tuolpûkhai chu; chun, chutaka chun a vêlin tukverhai a um a, a dung tieng chu tawng sâwmnga, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmhni panga a nih.

Chun, kawtkhâr bienghai chu huon sûng tuollai puo lem tienga chun a na, chun, chutaka kawtkhâr bienghaia chun, hi tieng sîra le khing tieng sîra khawm chun intûm thing- hai an um a; a hang fe kaina chu sirbi pariet a nih:
Chun, dâi kawtkhârhaia kawt- khâr bienghai sîra chun pindan le kawtkhârhai an um a; chutaka chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu an sâwp hlak.

Chun, dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk lûtnaa chun, hi tieng sîrah dawkân pahni, khing tieng sîrah dawkân pahni bawk, pumrawhmang thilin- hlân dâm, suol thilinhlân dâm, baw- sietna thilinhlân dâm thatna dingin a um a.
Chun, hmârtieng dâi kawt- khâra lûtnaa hang feh a, sîr khat a puotienga chun, dawkân pahni a um a; chun, a sîr khata chun, dâi kawt- khâra tuolpûka ṭhangsaa chun dawkân pahni bawk a um a.
Hi tieng sîrah dawkân pali, khingtieng sirah dawkân pali bawk; dâi kawtkhâr sîra chun an um a; chuong dawkân pariethai chunga chun inthâwinahai chu an that hlak.

Chun, pumrawhmang thilin- hlânna dingin lung a saka sak, tawng khat le a chenvea sei, tawng khat le a chenvea lien, tawng khata insâng dawkân pali an um a; chuong chunga chun inthawina le pumrawhmang thilinhlân ding an thatna ding hriemhreihai chu an sie a.
Chun, in sûnga chun a vêlin kuoikimhai kutpha bawka lienhai chu inbûk an na; chun, dawkânhai chunga chun inthâwina sa chu a um a.

Chun, dâi kawtkhâr sûngril lem puoa chun a mi ṭhuoi lût a; Ngai ta, pindan pahni huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema chun an um a; hmar- tieng kawtkhâr bula chu a nghat dân chu sim sawng a na, simtieng dâi kawtkhâr sîra pakhat chu a nghat dân hmâr sawng a nih.
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hi pindan, a nghat dân sim sawng hi in enkawl sin kawltu thiempuhai ta ding a nih.

Pindan a nghat dân hmar sawng hi thiempuhai, mâichâmhai sin enkawlna kawltuhai ta ding chu a nih; chuonghai chu Zadok naupasal- hai, chuonghai chu Levi naupasalhai laia ama rawng bâwl dinga LALPA kuom hnaia hunghai chu an nih.
Chun, huon sûng tuollai chu ân khih a, tawng zaa sei, tawng zaa lien, kil li inchen a nih; chun, mâichâm chu in tuola chun a um a.

Chun, in tuolpûka chun a mi ṭhuoi a, tuolpûk kawtkhâr bienghai chu ân khih a, hi tieng sîrah tawng nga, khing tieng sîrah tawng nga bawk; chun, kawtkhâr khingtieng chu hi tieng sîrah tawng thum, khing tieng sîrah tawng thum bawk a nih.

Chun, tuolpûk seizie chu tawng sâwmhni a na, a lien tieng chu tawng sâwmpahni a nih; chun, an hang kainaa chun sirbi sâwm a um a; chun, kawtkhâr bieng sîrhaia chun sût- puihai a um a, hi tieng sîrah pakhat, khing tieng sîrah pakhat bawk.
